channel.title: How do I add more?
channel.description: I updated my hp above head where now it shows npcs max hp but when i hit the corp it says he has 208hp but i put in the npc.config he has 2000. How do I fix this? I want to make 208 bigger but have no clue if this is in the client or server?

item.title: How do I add more?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Pkor159:

IF you’re using somesort of ring that adds 999999999 str bonus then it will show only 208 hp and not the actual hp. Try killing the corp with a normal weapon.

I did its the hp above the head

RandQm:

Try putting * 10 to the code that initializes the max health to see if the maxhealth is actually taken from the file you edited.

This is all I changed

str.writeByteS(misc.getCurrentHP(HP, MaxHP, HP));//The second hp was 100 str.writeByteC(MaxHP);//MaxHP was 100

Read full topic
